contents: 5. leaves 38a-38b: Fāʼidah li-tasʹhīl amr al-rizq / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-ʻĀmir al-Dimashqī.
6. leaves 39a-39b: Tarjamat Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Saffārīnī.
7. leaves 42a-52a: Ijāzah li-Muḥammad Sharīf Afandī al-Ghazzī al-ʻĀmirī / Ṣāliḥ ibn Ibrāhīm al-Dimashqī.
11. leaves 60a-63a: Ijāzat Muḥammad al-ʻĀmirī al-Dimashqī / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Bāqānī.
15. leaves 69a-69b: Qaṣīdat jawāb li-Muḥammad al-ʻĀmirī / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Fayrūz al-Ḥanbalī.
16. leaves 69b-74b: Ijāzat Muḥammad al-ʻĀmirī ʻalá baḥr al-rajaz / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Fayrūz al-Ḥanbalī.
17. leaves 75a-76b: Tarjamat Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Fayrūz al-Ḥanbalī.
18. leaves 77a-80a: Tarāḥim mā kāna fī jihat al-aḥsan min ʻulamāʼ al-Ḥanābilah minhum Abū Aḥmad.
20. leaf 81a: [Ijāzah fī sunnah] / Yūsuf ibn Ibrāhīm al-Zarqānī.
21. leaves 81b-82b: [Ijāzat Muḥammad Kamāl al-Dīn al-Ṣiddīqī al-Ḥusaynī].
24. leaf 119b: [Ijāzat Muḥammad Kamāl al-Dīn] / Sulaymān ibn ʻUmar al-Bajīrmī.
25. leaf 120a: Ijāzat Muḥammad Kamāl al-Dīn al-Ḥusaynī / ʻAlī al-Shaybanī.
27. leaves 121a-123b: Ijāzāt Muḥammad Kamāl al-Dīn al-Ḥusaynī.
29. leaves 129b-132a: Ijāzat ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Murādī al-Dimashqī al-Naqshabandī.
30. leaves 132b-136b: Ijāzat Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-ʻĀmirī al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Ghāzzī.

title.@value: [Collection of ijāzāt and other Arabic texts].

subject: Hadith—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
